name: Ludum Dare 38 - Bacteria Colony
description:
A space pizza game!

Collect resources and survive, and beat my record! What is your killcount?

This game is realistic, there is no sound in space! :)

Hints:

  • You can raise your HP more than 100 hp
  • Build soilder, you need will need it soon!
  • You must click on the mineral, and the energy, to collect it.
  • The game will start slow, but the difficulty will grow exponentially.

Used tools: Unity FireAlpaca MSPaint :)

Judge here:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/bacteria-co...
